revised_title: Growth and Form in Lower Plants and Meristems
tldr: This article discusses the growth and form of modular organisms, specifically focusing on lower plants and the occurrence of meristems. It compares the growth of fungal and streptomycete hyphae and their similarities in morphology. The article also explores the growth in lower green plants, particularly algae, and the question of whether coenocytic algae are modular or not.
